```{r}
#Packages Necessary
install.packages("readxl")
install.packages("dplyr")
install.packages("irr")
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(irr)
```

```{r}
# Analysis 1 of Criteria 5: Higher-Order Thinking

maylynn <- read_excel("Biology Question Evaluation (Maylynn).xlsx")
jarrett <- read_excel("Biology Question Evaluation (Jarrett).xlsx")

ratings_5 <- data.frame(
  Maylynn = maylynn[["5 - Higher-Order Thinking"]],
  Jarrett = jarrett[["5 - Higher-Order Thinking"]]
)

cat("Criterion 5 - Higher-Order Thinking:\n")
print(kappa2(ratings_5, weight = "equal"))


  
```
